This game has the potential to be good.  It's gone over the cliff in survivor bias.  Once you get to around rank 8, the game will just get you angry over and over and over.  I'm just tired of doing 2 chases, 5 gens rushed, and then i have to here survivors talk trash to me like they did something amazing.  The game favors them, its super easy to gen rush, and you can't do anything as a killer.  Do yourself a favor, uninstall or don't buy.  Also i'd like to point out the fact that you have no idea that you are playing against a super sweaty swf team.  It's broken AF this game.

Its very intense and scary. I have not had so much fun running away from a killer that I pretty much have no way of defending myself. If you have friends it would be a fun experience. The leveling system can be grindy but its worth it. The killers are really overpowered but thats the fun of the game. Would recommend=) 10/10
(Almost a year later): Ok so this game.... It's amazing don't get me wrong but they need to UPDATE the game. I love this game but after 110 hours of gameplay it gets stale. The Reason I have this many hours on the game is from buying the DLC to keep me playing. The DLC characters are fun but they need different game modes or something. The game is extremly toxic and when playing as killer it's not even fun in the higher levels because everyone is using OP glitches to get the upper hand on you. Also the hit boxes have to be fixed. I'll be completly through a window and on the other side the killer will swing and hit me,IT'S VERY FRUSTRATING!!! Ok so a recap if buying this game and it's on sale buy it it's a great game,It's only $20 and like $8 on sale,It has a pretty big player count and to first time players it's very scary (I still get jump scared) But the more you play the more you see the cracks. I leveled up almost every character I wanted to to max and I don't know what to do, anyway Very tense gameplay extremly fun with friends from what I've seen (I don't have any that play it with me). The game has a few glitches and can be frustrating but I would give it a 8/10 :) (6 Months later) Ok so where I left off i had some new feedback to give. I finally got a full squad of people to get it when it was on sale and oh my this game is so much better with friends. it's so nice that you can cordinate plans with people across the map leading to more escapes and more fun. I have a new found love for it and started taking it more seriously and usually when that happens it's bad but this time it was great when you get sucked in thinking for just a couple minutes that you are about to die and there is almost nothing you can do to stop it but just enough where if you put in enough skill and bit of luck you can escape. Again though the game still has issues as mentioned before but still at it's core I love it and also RE update was awesome. Overall at 300 hours Im going to give my final review but right now it's a 8.5/10. Ok final review after 304 hours. This game is flawed for sure but yet I'm still having the most fun i've ever had in gaming. Sure the game is basicly pay to win and as much as I hate it I still bought most of the DLC as its my favorite game. The nights I've had streaming with friends are the highlights of this game. It can be really intense and has a pretty steep learning curve. Now this is unlike any game I've played maybe besides friday the 13th. It's very satisfiying earning perks and making perk builds that get more complicated as you play the game. This really makes me feel like I'm achieving something even though there is a basically endless grind. The game is very what the player makes it. This is a good and bad thing. You could have games where both sides try their hardest to win while still be sportsmen like, However if one player decides to be toxic or throw then it ruins the game as any player that is being toxic or throwing ruins the game and the steaks. I've been playing this game for awhile and now I can rightfully say that this game is worth buying if you are a horror fan. The game is also extremely cheap so even if you don't like it your not losing too much. Overall I would give this game a 9/10 for my final score, Thank you. Ok soo I have more to put in at least on the killer side. The portion of the review you read was from survivor now lets talk killer. At first I hated it so much and went back to survivor. Then I started playing more up till now that I am a killer main. I found killer offers a different expirence unlike any game I've played. The matches are more intense then the survivor matches. Now even though in a asmetric horror game the killer should always have the upper hand in my opinion thats not how it works here. It is tough and super satisfying to get the 4k.Right now Im at 544 hours in the game and for all of you survivor mains out there try it out as your q times are already taking too long. Now with killer you are going to have your bad days just like any other game but its the worst in this game. The survivors will taunt you and teabag you but keep your chin up and you will be fine as in a couple more games from now you will be getting 4k's on 4k's on 4k's. Sometimes you have to remember that specially when trying new killers.overall the killer experience is a 9/10. If I make it to 1000 hours I will post again. Thank you :)

Interessantes Spiel-Konzept. Grafiken sind gut. Charaktere und Killer sind beide sehr detailliert in Hintergrund und Fähigkeiten.

I think the game is fun, and as with all of these sorts of four versus one games a great source of salt. As a survivor the game is genuinely a thrill, it's high pressure and high scare factor from every type of killer and escaping feels like an actual escape. I've met some nice folks as you might expect, and I've met some people that don't have very much better to do than troll but that's every game you come in to. 

If you do poorly as a killer it can often lead to trash talk and if you do well it's even more often toxic insults and accusations, but the chat doesn't kick in till the end of the match anyhow. Every killer is pretty unique and really fun to play, their play styles vary so much it's hard not to play game after game and suck up all that sweet sweet salt with each one. 

There are some general balance issues and hit boxes are strange sometimes, and the maps themselves do get repetitive but that doesn't matter because once you get battle hardened against the jump scares (which will never totally happen, it's just too scary) there is a pretty good competitive game under the hood and so there are opportunities to get better as both survivor and killer, repeating maps is just a tactical element. You learn the maps you do well so it's easy to forgive.

The DLC is expensive, there's a good few choices but with everything there is now it's hard not to feel a little disappointed with the basic options. Every killer seems to come in their own pack with a map and sometimes a new survivor and so unlocking every survivor or every killer will cost you, as most of the DLC hovers around 7 bucks per. 

Overall, it's a solid game and well worth a sale price. I can't say I would spend the full price on it given how chopped up the DLC makes it feel but it's a solid game you can play with friends or alone.

在无尽的祭天和处刑死亡里上分，在板子爆头光剑晃瞎技能白给中磨练技术（ ）新人两边都不讨好，做好人类输上黄段的思想准备和屠夫被迫PY人皇嘲讽的心态平衡，不然买了就是白给，非常的刺激和耐玩，短短几个小时克服音效带来的恐惧后马上就会变成开心农场或者与人皇队友一起攻克难关的搞笑休闲娱乐游戏。新人优先玩黑妹，等你黑妹40级了遗传自摸技能你就可以选择去接着升级到转生或者转行其他角色，玩的越多遗技能越多越容易生存，屠夫也是如此。人类别去骂人家红满配，屠夫也别总是烧红配加红苹果 GG是good game的意思，EZ直接念出来就知道是嘲讽，平衡心态就能得到愉快的游玩体验，但是对于拔线和只嘲讽过度影响心态的请看我ID，活该你被祖安。

ドM向けです。
まず初心者がキラーを始めると、ガバマッチングによって高ランクとマッチします。そこでかなり煽ってきます。
僕はドＭなので、煽られたら逆に興奮して殺る気が湧いてきます。
煽りに来る人は、ほとんどの場合鬼ごっこが上手ですので、尻を追いかけ回していると上達します。

それと全滅させた後に暴言を吐かれる事が稀にあります。これはご褒美みたいなものです。
生存者が顔を真っ赤にして打ち込んでいるのを考えると、嬉しくなってきます。
暴言はご褒美です。

暴言を吐かれたときは、「noob」だとか言い返さずに、あえて笑顔で「GG」と言ってやりましょう。
